title: Did everyone get their free skins yet?
body:
I was just wondering if everyone got their free skin yet? I was supposed to get 2 free skins because i purchased 12 mystery items. As of yet though i only have 1 (Red Card Kat). Is anyone else having this problem? I also thought it would be cool to post here what skin you got and give Riot a Thanks.

So thank you Riot, I do not really play Kat, but Red Card is cool. Thanks again

Also if you are reading this Riot and are wondering if I really did buy 12 mystery items, here you go: 1. 8-5 mystery skin Surprise Party Fiddlesticks to a friend 2. 8-4 ArticOPS Kennen mystery skin to a friend 3. 8-4 Waring kingdoms Tryndamyre Mystery skin to a friend 4. 8-4 TPA Nunu Mystery skin to a friend 5. 8-4 TPA Orianna mystery skin to a friend 6. 8-4 Lollipoppy mystery skin to a friend 7. 8-4 Battlebunny Riven mystery skin to a friend 8. 8-4 Maurder Ashe mystery skin to a friend 9. 8-4 Sheriff Caitlyn mystery skin to a friend 10. 8-4 Demon blade tyndamere mystery skin to a friend 11. 8-4 Kennen mystery Champ to a Friend 12. I self Mystery Gifted a skin for the last one it was jaximus Jax.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Distribution is taking a bit longer than expected. We've estimated that all gifts should be handed out by August 25th. Sorry for the delay!
Thank you for your quick response
I have gotten my second skin Frostfire annie

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=zOvylFEH,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-18T21:14:39.736+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> Distribution is taking a bit longer than expected. We've estimated that all gifts should be handed out by August 25th. Sorry for the delay!

Is distribution still occurring as I have received none, yet my friend has got over 5 or 6 and we gifted each other the same amount, hence why he got so many.

Taken from the [Help & Support page](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/tXjcpYAU-act-3-questions-about-the-bilgewater-event-we-got-you-covered-reward-distribution-on-going) - 

Update 8/19: All Mystery Skins in all Riot Regions should now be distributed. For those who were not able to get free Mystery Skins, we are working on awarding Free Mystery Champions, and if not champions, RP. This should be completed within a week!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=zOvylFEH,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2015-08-24T16:16:23.466+0000)
>
> Taken from the [Help & Support page](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/tXjcpYAU-act-3-questions-about-the-bilgewater-event-we-got-you-covered-reward-distribution-on-going) - 
> 
> Update 8/19: All Mystery Skins in all Riot Regions should now be distributed. For those who were not able to get free Mystery Skins, we are working on awarding Free Mystery Champions, and if not champions, RP. This should be completed within a week!

I still havent received a single reward yet

Sorry to hear that! D:

Please submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) so we can take a look at your account and make any necessary adjustments.

I got mine over the course of 3 days. My first one was Masquerade Evelynn which, I had just started playing her alot so I was ECSTATIC!! I was like "WTF Why is RITO giving me free skins?!" I completely forgot about the promotion hahaha. Thanks Riot!
O shit, Did you get a free skin for buying 8? I maxed out one day and then logged in and got a free Annie skin on Mon/Tuesday. I have been wondering why I got this skin.
you got a free skin for every 6 skins you bought
It is from Monty Python and the holy grail.

Again thank you Riot for rewarding us for gifting others. I got Red Card Kat for my first skin. I hope to get my second skin soon, might i suggest a random Cottentail Fizz? Not that i desperately want him or any thing. But i sorta do.... 

<iframe width="420" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/XcxKIJTb3Hg" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
